oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Program, The Nashville Community Playhouse, presentation of “Little Foxes,” 1943
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Nashville Community Playhouse program for a theatrical production of Lillian Hellman’s “The Little Foxes,” presented December 7th-11th, 1943. The production was directed by Mrs. Inez B. Adler. The actors in the cast are Lilian R. Ward; Al Margolin; Margie Knight; Alfred D. Moore; Cpt. Irvine Stirton; Noncie Reed Bradley; Sgt. Hugh O’Connell; Frank Drury; Virginia Mansell; and Pvt. John Newland. Includes a list of the sustaining membership for the 1943-44 year. Forms part of the Wilhelmina Webb Collection. 1 program.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adler, Mrs. Inez B.; Ward, Lilian R.; Margolin, Al; Knight, Margie; Moore, Alfred D.; Stirton, Irvine; Bradley, Noncie Reed; O’Connell, Hugh; Drury, Frank; Mansell, Virginia; Newland, John
